item.description: This privacy first smart home article will explain how to get the open source feature to see what is in your fridge while you are doing your grocery shopping. Most important, with a high Wife Acceptance Factor.

item.title: Adding an API to my grind and brew coffee machine to make it smart
item.description: This post will guide you through on how to connect a dumb Philips grind & brew hd7762 coffee machine to your privacy first home automation solution based on home assistant and esphome. Most important, with a high Wife Acceptance Factor.
